name: 2D Platformer Final (gabriellaaudia)
description:
Made by Gabriella Audia for CAS 117

Modifications

-reskinned the player and the enemies

-changed the skin of some pickups and changed the background/foreground details

-modified out of game menu

-custom music (beepbox)

-custom sound effects (beepbox)

-made 3 levels that are different and increase in difficulty
